---
title: "Nikon"
description: "PTP Nikon definitions"
---

# Nikon

## InvalidStatus

**Code:** `0xa004`

The operation cannot be performed due to the current camera status or an internal error.

---

## NotLiveView

**Code:** `0xa00e`

The camera is not in live view mode.

---

## ChangeCameraModeFailed

**Code:** `0xa003`

Indicates that the switching between the PC camera mode and the remote mode failed.

---
